Uses of Class
core.Component

  • Packages that use Component 
    Package Description
    components.audio  
    components.camera  
    components.light

    core  

    • Uses of Component in components.audio

      Subclasses of Component in components.audio 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AudioListenerComponent
      The scene's audio listener and it's position, orientation and velocity affects how we hear audio sources' sounds.
      class  AudioSourceComponent
      Audio sources can emit sounds.

    • Uses of Component in components.camera

      Subclasses of Component in components.camera 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CameraComponent
      Implements basic camera functions.
      class  FreeCameraComponent
      This class extends the DefaultCameraComponent and allows the user to control the camera movement and rotation by the keyboard.

    • Uses of Component in components.light

      Subclasses of Component in components.light 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultLightComponent
      This abstract class stores the light's diffuse, specular and ambient components.
      class  DirectionalLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a directional light source.
      class  PointLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a point light source.
      class  SpotLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a spot light source.

    • Uses of Component in components.renderables

      Subclasses of Component in components.renderables 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MeshComponent
      Encapsulates a Mesh and a Material.
      class  SplineComponent
      Encapsulates a Spline and a Material.

    • Uses of Component in core

      Fields in core with type parameters of type Component 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Component> GameObject.components
      List of the GameObject's Components.
      private static java.util.Map<java.lang.Class,java.util.List<Component>> Scene.lists
      Custom lists.
      Methods in core that return Component 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Component GameObject.getComponent(int index)
      Returns the GameObject's indexth Component.
      Methods in core with parameters of type Component 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean GameObject.addComponent(Component component)
      Adds the given Component to this GameObject.
      (package private) static void Scene.addComponentToLists(Component component)
      Adds the given Component to the Scene's corresponding lists if it's the instance of the list's class.
      boolean GameObject.removeComponent(Component component)
      Removes the given Component from the GameObject's components.
      (package private) static void Scene.removeComponentFromLists(Component component)
      Removes the given Component from the Scene's custom lists.
